medical_history.chief_complaint: Periumbilical and lower abdominal pain for 4 days.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms started 4 days ago with cramping periumbilical pain that spread to the lower abdomen over the next 2 days. Pain progressively worsened, prompting the patient to present to the ED. Patient reports no alleviating factors.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Paroxysmal atrial fibrillation, morbid obesity status post Roux-en-Y gastric bypass, hypertension, back pain, multiple prior abdominal surgeries including diagnostic laparoscopy and ventral hernia repair.
